entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: After defeating some of his muggers, you went to Vaigon Shinn's hideout near Mos Eisley and defeated Vaigon Shinn himself.
entries.journal_entry_description: Go to Vaigon Shinn's hideout outside of Mos Eisley, fight your way through his guards, and take him down.
entries.journal_entry_title: Thieves and Thugs and Hoodlums, Oh My!
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go to Vaigon Shinn's hideout and then defeat Vaigon Shinn and his guards.
entries.task01_journal_entry_title: Defeat Vaigon Shinn and his Guards
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp R'dawc and let her know you defeated Vaigon Shinn and his band of muggers.
entries.task03_comm_message_text: I've received word of your wonderful work with Peawp! Well done. Come speak with me.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Report back to Mayor Mikdanyell Guh'rantt.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Take down Vaigon Shinn and his band of muggers will fall apart.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Clear out Vaigon Shinn's hideout by taking down some of his guards.
